main.name: Amarnath Gangurde
main.description: I am a Computer Science graduate who adores coding and delves into AWS, Linux, and Docker.
main.bio: I am a Computer Science graduate deeply immersed in coding. My expertise lies in AWS, Linux, and Docker, while i also have passion about full-stack development. I specialize in frontend with React.js and backend with Node.js, I also have good grasp of react native and have develped some applications, weaving together seamless experiences with creativity and precision.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me below.

resume.skillmessage: My language and framework specific skills

education.description: I completed my Mechanical Diploma with a commendable 7.6 CGPA, delving into a plethora of subjects including Theory of Machines (TOM), Strength of Materials (SOM), and many more.

My passion for Computer Science led me to pursue a B.Tech Engineering degree in the field. Throughout this journey, I delved deep into various domains, including networking, programming languages, cloud computing, and Linux systems. The comprehensive curriculum exposed me to a myriad of concepts and technologies, fostering a rich understanding of computer science fundamentals and honing my skills in both theoretical knowledge and practical application.

work.title: Web App
work.description: For my major project, we developed Yaa Cloud, a cloud service similar to AWS. Users could deploy their websites on containers hosted on our platform. This project provided us with hands-on experience in cloud computing, containerization, and web hosting.

work.title: React Native App
work.description: For our minor project, we created a hotel management app specifically designed for our college's girls' hostel using React Native. This app ensured secure handling of all data related to the girls and hostel facilities. It provided a user-friendly interface for managing various aspects of hostel life, enhancing convenience and efficiency for both residents and administrators.
